title.content: Paid Ads Management Tools by Semrush | Semrush

metaDescription.content: Set up, launch, and optimize your paid ad campaigns directly through Semrush.

h2s.text: Maximize ad campaign efficiency with Semrush
h2s.html: Maximize ad campaign efficiency with Semrush

content.html:
1. Features

  2. Paid Ads Management

Paid Ads Management

Manage the full cycle of paid ad campaigns directly from Semrush. Streamline processes and scale your results, whether launching your first campaign or optimizing existing ones

Explore Now

  • Ads Launch Assistant

    Set up Google Ads campaigns easily with an advanced AI ad generator and Semrush data, getting high-quality suggestions at every step of the ad management process.

    Launch your Ads

Maximize ad campaign efficiency with Semrush

Register Now

Related Features

Make the most of your advertising campaigns with the data-powered tools

  • PPC Keyword Research

    Optimize your PPC campaign and make the most of your budget.

    Learn more
    4 tools

  • Website Monetization

    Monetize your audience using data-powered insights.

    Learn more
    2 tools
